thread.section_title: LendingTree Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LendingTree | www.lendingtree.com | 5 of 243
thread.title: Ken G

author: Ken G
title: Ken G
text: The process was extremely easy and was completed within less than a week. The only things I needed to do was choose a lender, upload a few pictures of my paycheck and some paperwork I filled out and in less than a week the funds were delivered into my account. Now they did give me a couple of phone calls and go through a process to insure my identity and to have the funds transferred but those lasted less than 5 minutes each. This was the first time I attempted to do this on-line, but I would not hesitate to work with them again or to recommend them.
